content: When typing a message you can uncheck "press Enter to send", which is quite useful on mobile. But it looks like there's no such option in edit mode?
the edit form appears to follow the selection that's set in the compose subwindow.
That is, you need to ctrl+enter to apply an edit if the "press enter to send" is unchecked, and just "enter" when its checked.
idk, if that's portable to the mobile client tho.
That's a nice hack. I was actually asking about the web site (as loaded in a mobile browser), but I can see how that's not going to be a priority
The mobile client always inserts a newline when you press enter, and has an explicit send button.
